jalse.actions

Interface ActionContext<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Actor type (can be ? if no actor).
    All Superinterfaces:
    ActionBindings
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableActionContext<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFutureActionContext, AbstractManualActionContext, ForkJoinActionEngine.ForkJoinContext, ManualActionEngine.ManualContext, ThreadPoolActionEngine.ThreadPoolContext

    public interface ActionContext<T>
extends ActionBindings
    ActionContext is supplied when running every Action. This provides contextual information about the running Action and also the ability to cancel it.

    Key-value pairs may be bound for this context to be used when performing the action.
    Author:
    Elliot Ford
